msg_btl_talk_leader_ghost_town_01:
Kick back, relax, and enjoy this last track.
Turn it up for a grave-rattlin’ good time![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_leader_ghost_town_02:
When I’m on the mic, even the dead rise up!
DJ G-Rave over there’s sure feelin’ it![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_leader_normal_town_01: You’re pretty good. I might end up losing this...[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_leader_normal_town_02: Come on, Larry! Step it up a notch!
msg_btl_talk_leader_normal_town_03:
We’ve got hungry customers waiting!
Give ’em something to cheer for, y’hear?
msg_btl_talk_leader_normal_town_04: Show us what you’ve got, Larry! And you too, kid!
msg_btl_talk_leader_normal_town_05:
Well, you heard the good folks... I suppose I can
put on a bit more of a show.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_iwa_02:
Well, this is looking a little rough. Shellder, let’s
serve up a helping of defeat—on the half shell![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_hikou_02:
Trying to drop rocks on folks is dangerous!
Let’s give this thing a good taste of defeat![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_01_02a:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
This is Professor Sada.[VAR 0114(000B)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_01_02b:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hello, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
This is Professor Turo.[VAR 0114(000E)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_01_03a:
Great Tusk is a Pokémon that came from the
Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000B)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_01_03b:
Iron Treads is a Pokémon that came from the
Great Crater of Paldea.[VAR 0114(000E)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_01_04a:
I ask that you do whatever is needed to subdue
it for me—with all due caution, of course.[VAR 0114(000B)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_01_04b:
I ask that you do whatever is needed to subdue
it for me—with all due caution, of course.[VAR 0114(000E)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_jimen_02:
I’m gonna use the Scovillain I caught nearby to
seize a real spicy victory. This is gonna burn![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_hagane_02:
Doesn’t matter how big an opponent is! Victory’s
gonna taste so good seasoned by my Toedscool![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_nushi_dragon_02:
This food chain’s got me pretty fascinated...
I’m gonna dig in and make a meal of this battle![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_kusa_01:
I know this is your first Pokémon battle, so let’s
just have some fun![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_kusa_02:
You must’ve been studying up! Smart move—
Grass is strong against Water![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_kusa_03:
Oooh, lucky! Landing a critical hit makes your
move do more damage than usual![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_hono_01:
I know this is your first Pokémon battle, so let’s
just have some fun![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_hono_02:
You must’ve been studying up! Smart move—
Fire is strong against Grass![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_hono_03:
Oooh, lucky! Landing a critical hit makes your
move do more damage than usual![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_mizu_01:
I know this is your first Pokémon battle, so let’s
just have some fun![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_mizu_02:
You must’ve been studying up! Smart move—
Water is strong against Fire![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_01_mizu_03:
Oooh, lucky! Landing a critical hit makes your
move do more damage than usual![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_01:
You seem like you’re getting better at this, so I’m
comin’ at you with TWO Pokémon this time![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_02:
Wow, doing even better than I expected!
You’re legit, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_03:
Terastallizing is always a solid strategy! It gives
moves of the Pokémon’s Tera Type more power![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_04:
You really work your type matchups! I can tell
how badly you wanna win![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_05:
A critical hit?! Wow, nice one—I have a hard time
landing those even when I try![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_07:
Battling you is a blast! Think I better pull out my
ace in the hole![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_08:
Terastallizing gives a real boost, see! Especially if
a move was already super effective![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_kusa_09:
Terastallizing gives a real boost, see! Even when
a move isn’t very effective, look how hard it hits![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_hono_01:
You seem like you’re getting better at this, so I’m
comin’ at you with TWO Pokémon this time![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_02_hono_02:

msg_btl_talk_rival_04_kusa_01:
Think of this as a practice run for your next Gym
battle. Come at me with everything you got![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_kusa_02:
Don’t pat yourself on the back just yet! My next
Pokémon’s gonna turn the tables![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_kusa_03:
Let’s try out that new move of yours!
Use Water Pulse, Quaxwell![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_kusa_04: Oooh, nice moves! Your skills sure are ripening![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_kusa_05:
Maybe people who can throw Poké Balls better
are better at landing critical hits, too...[VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_kusa_07:
Since you have a Tera Orb too, we can both
Terastallize our Pokémon fair and square![VAR 0114(0004)]

Think of this as a practice run for your next Gym
battle. Come at me with everything you got![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_hono_02:

msg_btl_talk_rival_04_hono_03:
Let’s try out that new move of yours!
Use Magical Leaf, Floragato![VAR 0114(0004)]

msg_btl_talk_rival_04_mizu_04: Oooh, nice moves! Your skills sure are ripening![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_04_mizu_05:

msg_btl_talk_rival_05_kusa_01:
I know La Primera’s watching, but no need to get
worked up. Just stay cool![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_05_kusa_02:
Haha, wow! You seeing this, Primera? I’m getting
backed right into a corner![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_05_kusa_03:
OK, I’m pulling out all the stops! Get ready—
I wanna see you stand up to this![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_05_kusa_04:
Oof, that was a good one! Your move really had
some zing to it![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_05_kusa_05:
Whoa—a critical hit, right when it counts! Luck’s
on your side for sure![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_05_kusa_07:
Time to Terastallize! Watch—I’m gonna make La
Primera’s eyes light up![VAR 0114(0004)]

msg_btl_talk_rival_06_kusa_01: Show me the battle skills that got you six badges![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_06_kusa_02:
Trading attacks on the brink of winning or losing
gives me chills! Let’s see who gets the win![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_06_kusa_03:
Get ready—this move is gonna hit with the force
of all my training![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_06_kusa_04:
That stung...but you’re not the only one who can
hit hard when it counts![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_06_kusa_05:
That’s the thrill of battles—you never know
what’s gonna happen next![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_06_kusa_07:
Here comes the fun part! Time to make this Tera
Orb shine![VAR 0114(0004)]

msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_01:
Finally, the thing I’ve waited all this time for!
Time to begin our greatest battle of all![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_02:
It’s all down to this—my last Pokémon. We’re
gonna fight with everything we’ve got![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_03: Shine blazingly bright, my greatest treasure![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_04:
Get ready to see how strong Quaquaval has
grown since the day we all met![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_05:
To think I helped teach you type matchups—
and now you’re using ’em to put the hurt on me![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_06:
How do you like my REAL hard hits? Man, it feels
good to finally let loose![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_07:
A critical hit at a critical moment! That goes
beyond luck—you’ve got some kind of gift![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_kusa_08:
See that crit? I clinched that through sheer
determination to win![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_hono_01:
Finally, the thing I’ve waited all this time for!
Time to begin our greatest battle of all![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_hono_02:

msg_btl_talk_rival_07_hono_03: Shine blazingly bright, my greatest treasure![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_07_hono_04:
Get ready to see how strong Meowscarada has
grown since the day we all met![VAR 0114(0004)]

and now you’re using ’em to put the hurt on me![VAR 0114(0004)]

msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_01_01: Gimme a battle that’ll electrify all my viewer pals![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_01_02:
Oh noes! This isn’t good! Loyal fans—I need to
hear you cheerin’! Gimme all you got![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_01_03:
Come fooorth, shiny li’l lightbulb! I’m not done
yet! Iono power, goooooo![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_01_04:
Danger—high voltage! Sorry if it’s TOO
shocking, ’eyyy![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_01_01:
You’re quite a good base to test my makeup
magic on. What shall I use on you?[VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_01_02:
You’re just as hard to get rid of as caked-on
mascara, I see. I need a good makeup remover![VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_01_03:
Come here, my little Florges! It’s time for a
makeover. You’ll become a new you![VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_01_04:
My bewitching beauty methods will cleanse you
right down to the depths of your pores![VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_01:
We don’t mess around in Montenevera. On my
stage we Double Battle—don’t let it scare ya.[VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_02:
Your youthful power’s a real threat! But the
party’s still goin’—I haven’t lost yet![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_04:
Put your SOUL into it, Toxtricity! Let’s bring
the power![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_01_01:
Don’t say I didn’t warn you. Not my fault if you
get overwhelmed.[VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_01_02:
You’re not just talk, I see. But you’re still one
false step from a steep fall![VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_01_03:
Battles are like mountains in winter—the situation
can change in a heartbeat.[VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_01_04:
You’re always just one step away from
devastation... The cold will leave you shaking.[VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_01_01:
Art is creation and destruction! Struggle, else
your defeat will nourish my Pokémon![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_01_02:
This has promise! Yes! Let us lead this artistic
endeavor to its conclusion at once![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_01_03:
Allow me to touch this work up slightly! I will call
it...“Truleewoodo”![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_01_04:
At times, art becomes a race against the clock!
Let us increase the pace![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_01_01:
I feel a bit indebted to ya, but don’t expect me
to go easy on ya just ’cause o’ that![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_01_02:
The tides ebb and flow! It’s time for a raging
tidal surge![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_01_03:
Prepare the rigging for a big transformation!
My Pokémon’s gon’ rock the boat![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_01_04:
One ol’ man Kofu special, comin’ right up! Hang
on tight or get swept away by the Surging Chef![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_01_01:
Don’t take my Bug-type Pokémon lightly. You will
be in for a world of pain if you do![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_01_02:
Oh? You’re quite good, aren’t you. How should
I roll things out from here?[VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_01_03:
Now, my little Pokémon! Time to break free from
your cocoon and come into your own![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_01_04:
Feast your eyes on my shining bug decoration!
Though this one is not so sweet![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_01_01: I just ate, so...let’s not go too hard.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_01_02:
This is still better than getting cornered by
my boss.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_01_04:
I think it’s time to show you that real life isn’t all
just being true to yourself...[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_jimen_01_01:
I finally get to battle you! I’ve been looking
forward to this, so don’t you give up too soon![VAR 0114(0013)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_jimen_01_02:
Nahahaha! Impressive! You really are something
else, kiddo![VAR 0114(0013)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_jimen_01_03:
Let’s finish this! Go on, Clodsire! Shake things up
a bit![VAR 0114(0013)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_jimen_01_04:
Watch your step, ’cause things are about to get
a bit shaky![VAR 0114(0013)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hagane_01_02:
I’m not scared! My last Pokémon will turn
things around![VAR 0114(0014)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hagane_01_03: It’s time to get dressed up all pretty, Tinkie![VAR 0114(0014)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hagane_01_04:
Steel-hard Pokémon always get a solid victory!
So I’m gonna win![VAR 0114(0014)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hikou_01_01:
Well, I’ll be trying my hand with Flying-type
Pokémon this time...[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hikou_01_02:
You’re even stronger than before. Guess I don’t
get a break today...[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hikou_01_03:
At the risk of messing up my suit a bit...it’s time
to get some wind at our backs.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_hikou_01_04:
I’d advise you to stay on your toes, because I’m
about to scatter you to the wind![VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_01_01:
Show me everything you’ve got. I shall face you
with my full strength![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_01_02: Only a little more until you pass! Don’t let up![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_01_03:
Come, O great dragon, and take a Tera Jewel as
your crown![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_01_04:
No point in letting this drag on... Behold, the
power to overwhelm everything![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_01:
I do hope you can defeat me and become
a Champion yourself.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_02:
This is how you’re supposed to unleash a move.
This is what it takes to be at the top.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_03:
Heh! Hahahahahaha! Don’t think you’ve won
just yet![VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_04:
Yes, that was the correct decision in this situation.
Please continue.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_05:
What’s the matter? You’re not one to let
something so insignificant fluster you.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_06:
Truly a devastating blow. That deserves a
standing ovation.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_07: Oh, a critical hit... Poor thing.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_01_10: Be the light that guides all Trainers, Glimmora.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_00_01:
These memories are leaving a bad taste in my
mouth—and I want it gone![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_01_02:
The Pokémon that I met during our hunt for the
Herba Mystica are all stars—every one of them![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_01_03:
Let’s celebrate your full recovery with a glow up!
Time to Terastallize, Mabosstiff![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_01_01:
You don’t really think things through, do ya?
Declarin’ war on Team Star is a real bad move.[VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_01_02:
Ha! How’s that for an openin’ track?! I’ll spin you
up good, party crasher![VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_01_03:
This beat drop’ll bust your ears open! DJ Vice
bringin’ the house dooown![VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_01_04: Time to up the tempo! This show ain’t over yet![VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_01_01:
Naught but punishment awaits thee, wretch!
A plague on your house![VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_01_02:
Certain moves can poison with a mere graze.
Tremble, scoundrel, for thy Pokémon’s sake.[VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_01_03:
This next move is as splendid as it is insidious—
behold as it gnaws its target away![VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_01_04:
You think to give me a taste of mine own poison?
Fie! I will fight on till the bitter end![VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_01_01:
I promise I’ll play nice, so don’t blame me when
this battle sends you blubbering back home![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_01_02:
Oopsie. Did you just realize how outmatched
you are? If you wanna give up, now’s the time![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_01_03:
Have a taste of this slick move! Betcha can’t
handle my Pokémon’s adorable strength![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_01_04:
What the HECK?! Why is MY team on the ropes?
That’s totally not fair![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_kakutou_boss_01_01:
This base is precious to us! I won’t let this raid
of yours go any further![VAR 0114(0022)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_kakutou_boss_01_02:
I give as good as I get—that’s a promise!
We’ll see who’s left standing in the end![VAR 0114(0022)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_kakutou_boss_01_04:
I...I refuse to lose! So please...lend me your
strength.[VAR 0114(0022)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_01_01: Right here, right now... You’re going down.[VAR 0114(001F)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_01_02: THAT was for the rest of the Schedar Squad![VAR 0114(001F)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_01_03:
This move’ll torch ya till there ain’t nothin’ but
ash left![VAR 0114(001F)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_01_04: Tch! I ain’t burned to a crisp just yet![VAR 0114(001F)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_kusa_01:
I am Cassiopeia of Team Star! With this battle,
I will finally bring Operation Starfall to an end![VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_kusa_02:
Very well... It seems I shall have to Terastallize
my Pokémon.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_kusa_03:
Heh. To think that I, Cassiopeia, would be
backed into a corner like this.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_kusa_04:
Do take a step back, please. This may get
dangerous.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_hono_01:
I am Cassiopeia of Team Star! With this battle,
I will finally bring Operation Starfall to an end![VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_hono_02:
Very well... It seems I shall have to Terastallize
my Pokémon.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_hono_03:
Heh. To think that I, Cassiopeia, would be
backed into a corner like this.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_hono_04:
Do take a step back, please. This may get
dangerous.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_mizu_01:
I am Cassiopeia of Team Star! With this battle,
I will finally bring Operation Starfall to an end![VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_mizu_02:
Very well... It seems I shall have to Terastallize
my Pokémon.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_mizu_03:
Heh. To think that I, Cassiopeia, would be
backed into a corner like this.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_01_mizu_04:
Do take a step back, please. This may get
dangerous.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_01_01:
I won’t hold back in this battle! I’ll stay true to
Team Star’s code![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_01_02:
Time to Terastallize! Shine bright like the starry
sky and become who you really want to be![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_01_03:
I can’t fault you on your battle skills at all.
No wonder the bosses fell at your hands.[VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_01_04: My Veevee power will crush you into stardust![VAR 0114(0008)]

msg_btl_talk_professor_02_01:
It’s true—our Poké Balls won’t work! How are we
even supposed to battle?![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_02:
Gyah! Some crazy electrical signal is jamming
our Poké Balls! Even I can’t get them open![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_03:
That’s totally cheating! And you call yourself
an adult?![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_05a:
It changed into its battle form! Let’s go,
Koraidon—you got this![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_05b:
It changed into its battle form! Let’s go,
Miraidon—you got this![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_06:
Th-this looks like it could be bad! Uh...hang in
there, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_07:
You took that hit like a champ! You can do this!
I know you can![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_08:
Oh man, can we really not pull off a win here?
This doesn’t look good...[VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_09:
[VAR BD06(0000)]H-hey, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Your
Tera\r
Orb’s\r
glowing![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_10a:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Koraidon!
Terastallize—and\r
finish\r
this off![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_10b:
[VAR BD06(0000)][VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Miraidon!
Terastallize—and\r
finish\r
this off![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_11:
Show ’em you won’t be pushed around! Time to
Terastallize and get in some supereffective hits![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_professor_02_12:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Go for it, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Time to
Terastallize\r
and\r
use\r
Tera Blast![VAR 0114(0004)]

You wıll fal| herə, withın this gɑrden paradisə—
and aɔhiəve n■thıng in the ənd.[VAR 0114(000B)]

and aɔhiəve n■thıng in the ənd.[VAR 0114(000E)]

msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_02_01:
Time to put on my serious face! Eyes wide open
like a Magnemite so you don’t miss a thing![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_02_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Hey! [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Quit hoggin’
the\r
limelight\r
and\r
let\r
me\r
shine\r
a\r
bit, yo![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_02_03:
Come fooorth, shiny li’l lightbulb! Be the
invention that leads me to victory! Bzzzzzzt![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_denki_leader_02_04:
Zap! Rock, paper, pew pew pew! Come on out
if yer weak to Electric stuff![VAR 0114(0019)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_02_01:
You want to know the secret to my beauty? I’ll
enroll you in my most difficult hands-on course.[VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_02_02:
I’m shook—and not in a good way. Unpleasant
surprises are NOT good for my skin.[VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_02_03:
Come here, my little Florges! It’s time for a skin
cleanse. You’ll become a new you![VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_esper_leader_02_04:
First, you must be beautiful! In the end, strength
favors beauty.[VAR 0114(001C)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_02_01:
C’mon, rookie! Show me you deserve to be
called a Champion![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_02_02:
Hangin’ on by the skin of my teeth! Gotta make
this count![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_02_03:
This ghostly change’ll turn your highs to lows!
The brightest lights cast the darkest shadows![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_02_04:
You think I’m down and out? I’m about to turn
your world upside-down![VAR 0114(001B)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_02_01:
Conditions are...all right, I guess. Good enough
to defeat you, anyway.[VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_02_02:
I won’t let things heat up any further. Time to
bring the deep freeze.[VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_02_03:
Let it freeze. Let it snow. Let it pile up on top
of us.[VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_koori_leader_02_04:
I think you’re getting a little hotheaded. Let me
cool you down with this move![VAR 0114(001A)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_02_01:
Let us ponder the art we will create together,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_02_02:
This work’s concept is the deep-rooting nature of
plants! A briar’s thorns are not easily removed![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_02_03:
I do hope this work lives up to my expectations!
I shall call it “Truleewoodo Part Two”![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_kusa_leader_02_04:
My dear grass...grow, I say! Heed my wishes
and grow![VAR 0114(0017)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_02_01:
Good ingredients don’t need no cover-up spices!
Get ready for fresh, raw ol’ man Kofu![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_02_02:
Gahaha! Batten down the hatches and prepare
for a storm! This’s what makes battling excitin’![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_02_03:
A Crabominable Terastallizing! Think outside
the crab trap, I say![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mizu_leader_02_04:
Better get a big breath o’ air, ’cause yer about to
get hit by a surgin’ wave![VAR 0114(0018)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_02_01:
Don’t expect me to be sweet today! And don’t
cry when you taste bitter defeat![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_02_02:
Perseverance is important for Bug types! It’s time
to leap toward victory![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_02_03:
My sweet little bear! Show me your new form as
if you were a bug emerging from its cocoon![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_mushi_leader_02_04:
I’ll smash you like a cake with this decorative
move! What do you think of this dessert?![VAR 0114(0016)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_02_01:
The boss takes some getting used to, you know.
You’ve got your work cut out for you...[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_02_02:
You’re just plain strong, aren’t you? But I always
output my best results when it’s crunch time.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_02_03:
Time to show what we can really do. Same good
work as always, please.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_normal_leader_02_04:
How’s the power of this move? See for yourself,
why don’t you.[VAR 0114(0015)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_02_01:
I want you and me to be on the same level...
So I’m going after this win without holding back![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_02_02:
I’m putting everything I’ve got into this...
No regrets allowed—no leftovers after this meal![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_02_03:
Let’s light up this School Battle Brawl, Mabosstiff!
Brighter than anybody![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_02_04:
Let’s put those great jaws to good use, bud!
We’re gonna chew up h[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0202)]iser hopes of victory![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_01_01:
Show me what you’ve got—in your own way and
at your own pace.[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_01_02:
Wow! You sure are strong! Is there some secret in
the way you raise your Pokémon?[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_01_03:
Just a little energy and there you have it!
Now watch as my Pokémon Terastallizes.[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_01_04:
Let’s try something a little different. I wonder
what effect this will have on the battle.[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_01_01:
Let’s have a good, clean battle, OK?
Best of luck![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_01_02:
You’ve got real fight in you, new kid! This battle’s
really stoked my fighting spirit![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_01_03: Aim to push past your limits day by day! Osu![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_01_04:
Give it your all! That’ll make the taste of victory
even sweeter![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_02_01: Let us set an example for everyone, you and I.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_02_02:
We’ll make this match a fitting one for the finale.
A grand spectacle![VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_02_03:
May you shine as brightly as the future of
Paldea, Glimmora![VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_02_04:
Being strong is a given for a Champion. You must
also learn to give the audience a show![VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_03_01:
Think you’ve got us on the run? Not at all, little
buddy—this is when we turn it around and shine![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_03_02:
Mabosstiff, time to Terastallize! No one can ever
outshine you![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_pepper_03_03: Now’s our chance! Show ’em how strong you are![VAR 0114(0006)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_02_01:
You always have to go all-out, don’t you?
...In a good way, I mean.[VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_02_02:
Time to Terastallize! Become who you really want
to be, and shine like the twinkling stars![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_botan_02_03:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Here I come, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].
With\r
this\r
move,\r
I’ll\r
be\r
the\r
Veevee victor![VAR 0114(0008)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_02_01:
I’m not gonna give up that easily! Time to give it
everything I’ve got and more![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_02_02:
Smash through your limits! Tell them
Terastallizing is here![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_kihada_02_03:
Time to attack head on like a hot-blooded
hurricane![VAR 0114(0024)]
msg_btl_talk_taimu_01_01:
Six minus five... Only one Pokémon left! But with
10 times the strength, I may as well have 10![VAR 0114(0025)]
msg_btl_talk_taimu_01_02:
Garganacl, be a dear and square up a bit more,
if you would.[VAR 0114(0025)]
msg_btl_talk_taimu_01_03:
Ah! This is so fun! Or as the kids would say, this
“rocks”! And I guess it’s time to rock your world![VAR 0114(0025)]
msg_btl_talk_rehoru_01_01:
How about taking a page from the history books
and allowing me to pull victory from defeat?[VAR 0114(0027)]
msg_btl_talk_rehoru_01_02:
It’s time to use the technology born of the Great
Crater! Primeval power, spill forth![VAR 0114(0027)]
msg_btl_talk_rehoru_01_03:
It’s time to put the history written by you and
your Pokémon to the test![VAR 0114(0027)]
msg_btl_talk_mimoza_01_01:
What? You gotta be kidding me! Am I seriously
down to my last Pokémon?![VAR 0114(0028)]
msg_btl_talk_mimoza_01_02: Let’s do this, Toxapex! It’s your time to shine![VAR 0114(0028)]
msg_btl_talk_mimoza_01_03:
Here comes a big one! Don’t worry—I’ll get you
some medicine afterward![VAR 0114(0028)]
msg_btl_talk_sawaro_01_01:
I will remain calm despite the circumstances.
I must stand firm![VAR 0114(0029)]
msg_btl_talk_sawaro_01_02:
Let us do this...adorably. Hatterene, it is time
to Terastallize.[VAR 0114(0029)]
msg_btl_talk_sawaro_01_03:
Though you are a student, I cannot go easy on
you—especially seeing as you are a Champion.[VAR 0114(0029)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_02_01:
Yep, you sure are strong! I need you to share
your Pokémon-raising secrets with me.[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_02_02:
We’re all ready to Terastallize! Time to activate
my Tera Orb.[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_zinia_02_03:
How about this move, then? I think it will be at
least somewhat effective.[VAR 0114(002A)]
msg_btl_talk_seizi_01_01:
I should not be the one saying au revoir to the
audience after this battle... That should be you![VAR 0114(0026)]
msg_btl_talk_seizi_01_02:
Do you want to see what I’m capable of? You do,
don’t you?[VAR 0114(0026)]
msg_btl_talk_seizi_01_03:
Pokémon moves are just another form of
communication! Consider this a greeting![VAR 0114(0026)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_kusa_01:
You’re doing awesome! But my last Pokémon is
gonna clinch us the win![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_kusa_02:
Time to Terastallize! Get ready for a bright,
shiny beatdown![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_kusa_03:
I’m about to hit you with all I’ve got! But I know
you’re ready for it, rival![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_hono_01:
You’re doing awesome! But my last Pokémon is
gonna clinch us the win![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_hono_02:
Time to Terastallize! Get ready for a bright,
shiny beatdown![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_hono_03:
I’m about to hit you with all I’ve got! But I know
you’re ready for it, rival![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_mizu_01:
You’re doing awesome! But my last Pokémon is
gonna clinch us the win![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_mizu_02:
Time to Terastallize! Get ready for a bright,
shiny beatdown![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_rival_08_mizu_03:
I’m about to hit you with all I’ve got! But I know
you’re ready for it, rival![VAR 0114(0004)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_kusa_01:
You really have grown splendidly over the course
of your Treasure Hunt.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_kusa_02:
As director of the academy, I always strive to
illuminate my students![VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_kusa_03:
This next move is rather strong. Do take it on the
chin, won’t you?[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_hono_01:
You really have grown splendidly over the course
of your Treasure Hunt.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_hono_02:
As director of the academy, I always strive to
illuminate my students![VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_hono_03:
This next move is rather strong. Do take it on the
chin, won’t you?[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_mizu_01:
You really have grown splendidly over the course
of your Treasure Hunt.[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_mizu_02:
As director of the academy, I always strive to
illuminate my students![VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_clavel_02_mizu_03:
This next move is rather strong. Do take it on the
chin, won’t you?[VAR 0114(000A)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_02_01:
The final match is at its climax! Allow me to add
a flourish of color to its glorious conclusion![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_02_02:
Only a dragon deserves a throne at the top!
Your brilliant color will outshine all others![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_e4_dragon_02_03:
A Dragon type with even more dragon now!
Repetition of patterns can create great art![VAR 0114(0012)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_03_01:
I see you haven’t been slacking off. You’re an
inspiration to all Champions of Paldea.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_03_02:
Become the light that shines on all who reach
the pinnacle, Glimmora.[VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_chairperson_03_03:
This is what it means to face the Top Champion!
Let’s see if you can make it past me![VAR 0114(0011)]
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_01_01:
Wow! This battle’s amazing! I’m gonna call my
friends to come cheer you on!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_02_01:
That Trainer might actually be really good!
C’mon! You can do it!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_02_02:
Whoa! [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe just barely held on! This is some
white-knuckle battling!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_03_01:
That move was really great! Consider me your
newest fan!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_03_02:
I bet that kid’s going to do something really wild
from here! I know [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0100)]she will!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_03_03:
Nice move choice! [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe’s really sledgin’ up
MC Sledge!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_05:
Show us an awesome battle, Ryme! And you too,
student kid!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_06:
One of Ryme’s Pokémon went down! Woo!
This is so exciting!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_07:
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe’s holding out against Ryme’s offensive!
Come on! You can do it!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_08:
Nice! [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe totally nailed that Pokémon’s weakness
without batting an eye!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_09: Awesome! That was perfect timing to Terastallize!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_10:
Yeah! It’s a vibe now! Put your hands uuup!
Ryme! Ryme! Ryme!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_11:
Throw a better rap right back at ’em! Ryme!
Ryme! Ryme!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_12:
Awww snap, a supereffective move! That’s so
tight! Ryme! Ryme! Ryme!
msg_btl_talk_gym_ghost_leader_01_13:
Ghost Terastallization is the bomb! You’re really
killin’ it, Ryme!
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_02_01:
Welcome to the main stage! DJ Vice here,
kickin’ off today’s sessioooooon![VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_02_03:
Heads up, bud—it’s about to get evil up in here!
You won’t learn nothin’ if I hold back, after all![VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_aku_boss_02_04:
Should’ve known this’d turn into a battle of the
bands. Sucks for you the audience is on my side![VAR 0114(0021)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_02_01:
There is no night nor day that I do not spend
in training! Behold the fruits of my labor![VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_02_03:
I shall show thee the truest essence of poison!
Tremble ’fore its grim and deadly beauty![VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_doku_boss_02_04:
Even a single drop of poison can kill! ’Tis far too
early to rest assured of thy victory.[VAR 0114(0023)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_02_01:
This time, I’ll wipe that smug look off your face
for sure! You’re going down![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_02_03:
You ready for more of my slick, adorable moves?
’Cause this one’s gonna be pure torture![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_fairy_boss_02_04:
WHAT?! Am I LOSING?! You’re too good at this!
It’s so unfair![VAR 0114(0020)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_kakutou_boss_02_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Right then, [VAR TRNAME(0000)]! Hope
you’re\r
ready\r
for\r
a\r
good,\r
proper battle![VAR 0114(0022)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_kakutou_boss_02_03:
When facing down a foe, there’s only one thing
to do—push for victory with everything you have![VAR 0114(0022)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_kakutou_boss_02_04:
I focus best when I’m in a tight spot! I’ll show you
I can still win![VAR 0114(0022)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_02_01:
You’re a weird one too, aren’tcha? But y’know
what, forget it... Let’s do this.[VAR 0114(001F)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_02_03: Aight, you asked for it. I’m blowin’ this battle up![VAR 0114(001F)]
msg_btl_talk_dan_honoo_boss_02_04:
Heh, you lit a red-hot fire under me.
Not bad, pal![VAR 0114(001F)]
